pages.text: $(item)Energion Batteries$() are simple way of exploiting $(item)Energion Dust$(). Empty batteries can be manually filled, making them ready to be used in the machines that uses them.$(br2)Batteries will eventually deplete with usage and will need to refilled again.

Bigger $(thing)Batteries$() can be made, which last longer but requires more $(item)Energion Dust$() to be filled up again.$(br2)As their names imply, $(item)Double Energion Batteries$() require twice the $(item)Energion Dust$() and last twice as long, while $(item)Triple Energion Battery$() require 3 times as much $(item)Energion Dust$() and last 3 times as long when compared to simple $(item)Energion Batteries$().
